instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPDCIN_G3H: What is PPDCIN_G3H? PPDCIN_G3H Is a power rail that comes directly from the laptop charger..
definitions.3V3_S5: What is 3V3_S5? 3V3_S5 and PP3V3_S5 are interchangeable, see definition for PP3V3_S5. .

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no PP5V S4RS3 or s4 state
threads.message:
as described i dont get either. i forced 5 volts onto pad 3 of dc in board connector and then hookup the charger i get 0.182amps wont turn on and i still get no s4 state.

when i got this board j7000 was ripped out and i had to restore <SIGNAL>PPDCIN_G3H</SIGNAL> to get to this point.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no PP5V S4RS3 or s4 state
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no PP5V S4RS3 or s4 state
threads.message: Supposedly there was no liquid spill but i did notice a tiny bit of black spot on a test point near the <SIGNAL>DCIN_G3H</SIGNAL> entry point to inrush limiter. Which is the area where i had to replace a diode and a transistor to get it to this point.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no PP5V S4RS3 or s4 state
threads.message: Need the usual, PPBUS, <SIGNAL>3V3_S5</SIGNAL>, PPVRTC etc.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no PP5V S4RS3 or s4 state
